mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (C_Index, C_Name, C_Addr, C_Sales, C_Id) VALUES (CUSTOMER_SEQ.nextval, #{cName}, #{cAddr}, #{cSales}, #{cId})

INSERT INTO CUSTOMERINFO (C_ID, P_NAME, P_VERSION, CI_HWOS, CI_SYSTEM, CI_CHECK, CI_MONTHLY, CI_DEGREE, CI_MEMO, P_ID) VALUES (#{cId}, #{pName}, #{pVersion}, #{ciHWOS}, #{ciSystem}, #{ciCheck}, #{ciMonthly}, #{ciDegree}, #{ciMemo}, #{pId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM CUSTOMER c LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOMERINFO ci ON c.C_Id = ci.C_Id WHERE ci.P_Id = #{pId}

select c.C_ID, c.c_sales, c.c_addr, c.c_name, ci.ci_check, ci.ci_degree, ci.ci_memo, ci.ci_monthly, p.pname pentauser, ci.p_id, ci.ci_hwos, ci.ci_system, ci.p_name, ci.p_version, ci.p_id from customer c, pentauser p, customerinfo ci where c.c_id = ci.c_id and p.pid = ci.p_id and ci.c_id=#{cId}
